policy_name: bob_insert
check_expression:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM (bet_proposals bp
     JOIN table_members tm ON ((tm.table_id = bp.table_id)))
  WHERE ((bp.bet_id = bet_mode_best_of_best.bet_id) AND (tm.user_id = auth.uid()) AND (bp.proposer_user_id = auth.uid()) AND (bp.bet_status = 'active'::text))))

policy_name: bob_select
using_expression:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM bet_proposals bp
  WHERE ((bp.bet_id = bet_mode_best_of_best.bet_id) AND is_user_member_of_table(bp.table_id, auth.uid()))))

policy_name: bob_update
using_expression:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM bet_proposals bp
  WHERE ((bp.bet_id = bet_mode_best_of_best.bet_id) AND (bp.proposer_user_id = auth.uid()) AND (bp.bet_status = 'active'::text))))

policy_name: Participations are updatable by users
Users can participate in open bets in their tables
check_expression:
((auth.uid() = user_id) AND (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM table_members tm
  WHERE ((tm.table_id = bet_participations.table_id) AND (tm.user_id = auth.uid())))) AND (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM bet_proposals bp
  WHERE ((bp.bet_id = bet_participations.bet_id) AND (bp.table_id = bet_participations.table_id) AND (bp.bet_status = 'active'::text) AND (EXTRACT(epoch FROM (now() - bp.proposal_time)) < (bp.time_limit_seconds)::numeric)))))

policy_name: Users can view participations in their tables or their own
Allow members to create bet proposals in their tables
check_expression:
((proposer_user_id = auth.uid()) AND (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM table_members tm
  WHERE ((tm.table_id = bet_proposals.table_id) AND (tm.user_id = auth.uid())))))

policy_name: Allow members to view bet proposals in their tables
using_expression:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM table_members tm
  WHERE ((tm.table_id = bet_proposals.table_id) AND (tm.user_id = auth.uid()))))

policy_name: Allow proposers to update their open bet proposals
using_expression: ((proposer_user_id = auth.uid()) AND (bet_status = 'active'::text) AND ((close_time IS NULL) OR (now() < close_time)))
check_expression: ((proposer_user_id = auth.uid()) AND ((close_time IS NULL) OR (now() < close_time)))

Allow users to read their own friendships
Allow users to remove their own friendships

System notifications inserts are restricted

   FROM tables pt
  WHERE ((pt.table_id = table_members.table_id) AND (pt.host_user_id = auth.uid()))))
